alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bertie and southwestern Chowan Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 843 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Powellsville, or 8 miles north of Windsor, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in localized ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Colerain, Askewville, Goose Pond, Wakelon, Whites Crossroads, Rosemead, Mount Gould and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
